segments.text: The most striking thing to me is definitely the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing out of the faucet, relentlessly filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet, onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is already quite wide and looks deep.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the water streaming down the cabinet doors below the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, however, seems completely oblivious to this watery calamity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on drying that single plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite frustrating to watch her remain so unaware of the growing damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water can cause so much damage to wooden cabinets and floors, you know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This carelessness is quite irritating, especially when the issue is so evident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to reach in and turn that faucet off myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste of water and potential ruin to the entire kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation could have been so easily avoided from the start.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating display of distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR
